name: versiones-frontend
description: Frontend moderno para sistema de gestión de versiones con React 18 + TypeScript + Vite

scripts.dev: concurrently "cross-env BROWSER=none vite" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron ."
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc && vite build --logLevel silent
scripts.pack: node scripts/create-icon.cjs && npx electron-packager . "Gestor de Versiones" --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist-electron --overwrite --icon=electron/icon.ico --asar --prune=true
scripts.start: node -e "require('child_process').spawn('.\\dist-electron\\Gestor de Versiones-win32-x64\\Gestor de Versiones.exe',{detached:true,stdio:'ignore'}).unref();console.log('✅ Aplicación iniciada')"
scripts.desktop: npm run build && npm run pack && npm run start
